purpose: Facilitate the creation and deployment of AI agents with a focus on skill integration and open collaboration
principle: Builds on a modular architecture allowing developers to integrate various skills and intents into AI agents using Python and blockchain technologies
reusability: Highly modular and composable, supports integration with multiple skills and intents, API support for agent interaction
limitations: Alpha status indicates potential instability and incomplete features, limited documentation on advanced use cases
name: intentkit
description: An open and fair framework for everyone to build AI agents equipped with powerful skills. Launch your agent, improve the world, your wallet, or both!
highlight: Open and fair framework for building AI agents with powerful skills
